ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: The human readable description of this population group.

ivardefs.name: identifier
ivardefs.desc: A unique identifier for the group. This identifier will used to report data for the group in the measure report.

ivardefs.name: name
ivardefs.desc: Optional name or short description of this group.

ivardefs.name: population_
ivardefs.desc: A population criteria for the measure.

ivardefs.name: stratifier_
ivardefs.desc: The stratifier criteria for the measure report, specified as either the name of a valid CQL expression defined within a referenced library, or a valid FHIR Resource Path.

properties.desc: A group of population criteria for the measure.
